definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The second part gives theoretical analysis of movable property mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，动产抵押追及力分析。

sentences.english: How Have Land-use Regulations Affected Property values in Oregon?
sentences.chinese: 俄勒冈土地利用条例怎样影响不动产价值？

sentences.english: The situs test also applies in relation to tangible movable property.
sentences.chinese: 财产所在地规则同样适用于有形动产。

sentences.english: Paul cashed in on his real-estate investments.
sentences.chinese: 保罗靠不动产投资赚了钱。

sentences.english: HIRO: Yeah. He used to be a real estate salesperson.
sentences.chinese: 是的，他曾经是不动产销售员。

sentences.english: A uniform registration system over realties shall be practiced by the state.
sentences.chinese: 国家对不动产实行统一登记制度。

sentences.english: The second part is about the subject matter of Chattel Mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分研究了动产抵押标的物范围。

sentences.english: The provisional regulations on the registration of immovable property were officially implemented.
sentences.chinese: 不动产登记暂行条例正式实施。

sentences.english: Part one is about the origin and significance of the personal property register.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分为动产物权登记制度的缘起与意义。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: The bank did not consider personalty when assessing the worth of the borrower.
sentences.chinese: 这家银行在评估借贷人资产时不将动产考虑在内。

sentences.english: The government levies taxes on real estate and personal property.
sentences.chinese: 政府征收不动产和动产税。

sentences.english: The government levies taxes on real estate and personal property.
sentences.chinese: 政府征收不动产和动产税。

sentences.english: The flourish of chattel hypothecation benefits from Anglo-American law.
sentences.chinese: 动产抵押制度重新焕发生命力得益于英美法系。

sentences.english: It is now usual to revalue property assets on a more regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 更加频繁地对不动产进行重新估价如今已很平常。

sentences.english: This paper first introduces the historical evolution of the real property registration system.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先介绍了国内外不动产登记制度的历史沿革。

sentences.english: By the means of registration, the chattel has a confrontation effect; but there is also an exception.
sentences.chinese: 经登记之动产抵押权具有对抗效力，但也有例外。

definition: to provide (an asset) as security for a loan/to put up collateral
